Topic.Title: Digitimes: HP and DELL to launch Win8 RT tablets at end of October

Message.Msg: my guess, pricing took it at HP. Now haven't we heard that story before? remember all those Tegra 2 amazon tablets? looks like OMAP just took another breadth and lingers on.... dell is behind Asus in consumers, way behind. And that's really because Asus hasn't gone into corporate yet. omap 5 with dual A15 should have 50% better performance and user experiene than tegra 3 in single threaded apps. Once nvda/asus slipped last X'mas, tegra 3 is just another processor, nothing special anymore. so A15s at ti and qcom are in production in devices now. where is wayne? and how much lead time is that $100M/Q loss buying?

Topic.Title: Does NVDA ever close green

Message.Msg: Senor AMD, at least it is a happier existence for them than the reality of probably their only stock holding going down most days. As long as they believe it is going up and never look at or mention or read about the stock price, they can believe that the stock price is indeed at $20 or $50 or $100. They can love the rest of their lives very happy believing that, so long as nobody mentions the stock price or poor stock performance and brings them back to reality.
